autoconf.docs:
**, boolean**: Get capabilities automatically. Allows you not to manually define most of the capabilities of the appliance. Defaults to `True`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

beeper.docs:
**, boolean**: Beeper feedback on command. Defaults to `False`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

custom_fan_modes.docs:
**, list**: List of supported custom fan modes. Possible values are: `SILENT`, `TURBO`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

custom_presets.docs:
**, list**: List of supported custom presets. Possible values are: `FREEZE_PROTECTION`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity_setpoint.docs:
The information for the humidity indoor sensor (experimental).
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

num_attempts.docs:
**, int**: Number of request attempts between 1 and 5 inclusive. Defaults to `3`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

outdoor_temperature.docs:
The information for the outdoor temperature sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

period.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Minimal period between requests to the appliance. Defaults to `1s`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

power_usage.docs:
The information for the current power consumption sensor.
  * All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

supported_modes.docs:
**, list**: List of supported modes. Possible values are: `HEAT_COOL`, `COOL`, `HEAT`, `DRY`, `FAN_ONLY`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

supported_presets.docs:
**, list**: List of supported presets. Possible values are: `ECO`, `BOOST`, `SLEEP`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

supported_swing_modes.docs:
**, list**: List of supported swing modes. Possible values are: `VERTICAL`, `HORIZONTAL`, `BOTH`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

timeout.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Request response timeout until next request attempt. Defaults to `2s`.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

transmitter_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Defined and used automatically when using [Remote Transmitter](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html) component for IR commands transmit.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [Midea Air Conditioner](https://esphome.io/components/climate/midea.html#configuration-variables)*
